name: 陳盈竹
objective:
本課程內容包括熱量傳送操作及其應用。
This course contents heat transfer and its application.
schedule:
Week#1: Course overview
Week#2: Brief introduction to heat transfer modes
Week#3: Thermal conductivity and thermal diffusivity
Week#4: Energy balance and heat diffusion equations
Week#5-6: 1D conduction in a plane, cylindrical and composite walls
Week#7-8: Heat transfer over extended and finned surfaces
Week#9: Mid-term exam
Week#10: 2D conduction 
Week#11: Transient conduction
Week#12-14: Convection over external surface, flat plate, and cylinder
Week#15-17: Heat transfer in internal flows
Week#18: Final exam
materials:
1.	Incropera's Principles of Heat and Mass Transfer by F. P. Incropera et al., 8th Ed., John Wiley & Sons, Hoboken, N.J., 2019.
2.	熱傳遞 (精華版), 徐金城 編譯，高立，2021.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
